creator: roku@apache.org
text:
Use version number defined in properties-build.xml in

- introduction.xml
- lenya.nsi

Use ant replace or sth. like that to achieve that

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: *** Bug 31964 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

this has been done for about.xml, introduction.xml and publication.xml

lenya.nsi is currently not copied to the build, and adding it there would not
work at this time because you lose the @lenya.version@ the first time you run
the substitution.
creator: gregor@apache.org
